User Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/4.0; SLCC2; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET CLR 3.0.30729; Media Center PC 6.0; CMNTDF; BRI/1; InfoPath.2; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E)

Steps to reproduce:

i use a proxy server, a client pc IE work well, it conect to de domain server and take de credential from kerberos, but when it use FF it`s get freeze and teke minutes to promt username and password. this only happen on win7


Actual results:

i use a proxy server, and kerberos authentification it`s done but FF it`s get freeze and teke minutes to promt username and password. this only happen on win7, on winXP work ok
